sourceDesc.p: Work of the literatures of Ethiopia and Eritrea

revisionDesc.change: Updatedlist of witnesses and edition with textparts for all attested commemorations

div.label: First half of the year
div.note: This record lists all commemorations attested at least once in all known manuscripts of this recension containing the first half of the year or part of it. It therefore does not represent an articulation of commemorations as present in a specific witness. The commemorations of each manuscript are described in the respective manuscript records. Commemorations which deviate from the standard of commemorations attested in all manuscripts are indicated as 'non-standard'.

Second half of the year
div.note: This record lists all commemorations which are attested in at least one of all currently known witnesses of group B for the second half of the year: , , , , , and . Commemorations which are not common to all witnesses of the respective day are marked as non-standard. The commemorations of each manuscript are described in the respective manuscript records.
